thread.title: Oakmont, Harmar making do without Hulton Bridge
thread.title_full: Oakmont, Harmar making do without Hulton Bridge

title: Oakmont, Harmar making do without Hulton Bridge
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post - Today 
It has been 107 years since residents of Oakmont and Harmar had to deal with not having a bridge between their two towns....
